pages.title: Rather Silly Exam
pages.intro: The exam lasts thirty minutes and has four parts
parts: What was the third one, again?
body: Please read the instructions for each section carefully.
When you are ready to start the exam, click the button below.

intro: In this section of the test, you will have an opportunity to demonstrate your general knowledge.
Answer each question in this part to the best of your ability.

questions.heading: Example
body: Why should the Greeks' goal against the German philosophers have been disallowed?
questions.ending: As any serious student of Marx's theory of alienation would know, it was clearly offside.
answers: The reality is merely an a priori adjunct of non-naturalistic ethics.
Ontologically the goal exists only in the imagination.
Visible factors are created by the human mind and are absent from the goal-in-itself.

body: What is the answer to life, the universe and everything?
answers: Whatever you want it to be, baby
Never mind the meaning of life, dear, let's have a nice cup of tea

body: How did the knights escape from the monster?
answers: They threw sand in its eyes.
They sought an injunction against the monster.
The animator had a heart attack.

body: What is the worst French insult?
answers: I will make castanets out of your testicles.
I call you a silly thing.
I fart in your general direction.

body: What is the main precursor to armageddon?
answers: A friend shall lose a friend's hammer.
There will be one government ruling the whole world.
Plagues of locusts shall attack every McDonald's in the world and get very sick.
Every first-born child shall be infected with a tickly cough.
The Norwegian Blue prefers kipping on its back.

intro: Read and think about the following statement:
How could a swallow bring a coconut to such a temperate zone?
